name: Greater Ironclad Reactions
text: You are able to quickly react to attacks.
prerequisites: Combat Reflexes, Ironclad Reactions, base attack bonus +11 or fighter level 8th, armor trainingclass feature, proficiency with medium armor.
benefit: You can use Ironclad Reactions more than once per round, but not more than once for each act you take that provokes an attack of opportunity. Each 5-foot step you take still counts as expending one use of an attack of opportunity.
staminaText: You can spend 5 stamina points to use this feat without it counting against your maximum number of attacks of opportunity for that round. (See page 16.)
text_zh: 你可以快速地对攻击做出反应。
prerequisites_zh: 战斗反射，装甲反应，BAB+11或者战士8级，盔甲训练职业特性，擅长中甲。
benefit_zh: 你在每轮中可以多次使用装甲反应，但对于每个你会造成借机动作你只能做一次5尺快步。每次5尺快步仍然会被视作使用了1次你的借机攻击次数。
staminaText_zh: 你可以使用5点耐力来在使用这个专长时不计入你的每轮最大借机攻击次数。
